text: Helena Pietraszkiewicz (20 July 1953 – 1 March 2021) was a Polish psychologist and politician. She was born in Lublin, Poland. Pietraszkiewicz was a member of the Law and Justice Party. She was the Voivode of Łódz from 2006 until 2007. Pietraszkiewicz died on 1 March 2021 in Lublin at the age of 67. ==References== Category:Polish psychologists Category:Polish politicians Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Helena Pietraszkiewicz
